text.autoconfig.levelclear.title: Mod Config
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.trigge: Specify the item IDs required to clear the level. Multiple items can be added.
Specify the advancement IDs required to clear the level. Multiple advancements can be added.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.chatMe: The message displayed in the chat when the level is cleared (<player> will be replaced with the player's name).
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.destro: Whether to enable the option to delete the game save upon exiting. If true, the save will be deleted after exiting the game.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.minPla: Minimum Players to Destroy Game Save
The minimum number of players required to trigger the deletion of the game save.
